data.title: Home and Exile by Lewis Nkosi: Very Good Hardcover (1965) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Longmans, Green & Co, London - 1965 - Condition: Very Good - Very Good - A very good copy of the first UK hard cover edition (published 1965) in a like (not price-clipped dust-jacket. Previous owners' names and address label modestly atop the front free endpaper. Sparse underling/marginal strikes on approximately three dozen136 pages; no highlighting. The binding and jacket are bright, with moderate wear at the extremities of the jacket. - Home and Exile

Terms of Sale:

All items are offered subject to prior sale. We accept checks (drawn on U.S. banks) and money orders (in U.S. funds); payment via PayPal (select PayPal upon check-out, and we will invoice you via PayPal); and credit card payment via the ABE Commerce options offered by abebooks.com (Note: ABE processes all credit card payments via its secure servers, so we have no access to your credit card information). All items are may be returned within 14 days days for a full refund of the book price for any...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. International shipping rates are based on the assumption that the book will fit in a USPS International Flat Rate Envelope with sufficient protection. Larger books will require additional shipping charges.
